    • Blindscience

      A national clearinghouse of resources and expertise related to nonvisual scientific exploration

    • Brickipedia

      Free online lego encyclopedia

    • Bricklink

      For finding older/retired sets

    • Brickset

      Guide to LEGO sets. Features database, collection, reviews and more.

    • Ebay

      For finding older sets

    • JANGBRiCKS

      LEGO reviews & MOCs, Mega Bloks & more!

    • just2good's Youtube Channel

      Youtuber just2good reviews lego sets

    • Lego Website

      The lego website, which sells sets directly.
